## Read data
```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
mack_verts <- read_csv(here::here("data", "sal_trout", "AS00601.csv"))

# view
view(mack_verts)
```

## Wrangling/Exploring
```{r}
# update cols
library(janitor)
mack_verts<- mack_verts %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
# individual access practice
mc_wt_5 <- mack_verts$weight[5]
mc_length_8_20 <- mack_verts$length1[8:20]
mc_dates <- as.Date(mack_verts$sampledate)
```

## Salamder Subset
```{r}
# use filter to create salamander subset where species == DITE
library(dplyr)
mc_salamanders <- dplyr::filter(mack_verts, species == "DITE")
```

```{r}
# plot length vs weight
library(ggplot2)
library(ggtext) # for subtitle lol
ggplot(data = mc_salamanders, aes(x = length1, y = weight)) +
  geom_point(color = "orange", alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Salamander Size vs Weight Plot",
       x = "Length (mm)",
       y = "Weight (g)",
       subtitle = "For Pacific Giant Salamanders (*Dicamptodon tenebrosus*)",
       caption = "Retreived from Gregory, S.V. and I. Arismendi. 2020. Aquatic Vertebrate Population Study in Mack Creek, Andrews Experimental Forest, 1987 to present ver 14. Environmental Data Initiative.") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.subtitle = element_markdown(),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 5.8)
  )
```

```{r}
# export plot
ggsave(here::here("figs", "salamander_size.png"), height = 6, width = 7)
```
